biotools.summary: CATA (The chromatin accessibility of cancer database) is a comprehensive Cancer ATAC-seq database that aim to provided a large number of available resources on cancer ATAC-seq datas. The database was annotated with potential functions of ATAC-Peak in the cancer.

bioschemas.name: CATA
bioschemas.summary: CATA (The chromatin accessibility of cancer database) is a comprehensive Cancer ATAC-seq database that aim to provided a large number of available resources on cancer ATAC-seq datas. The database was annotated with potential functions of ATAC-Peak in the cancer.
